name: Ext_R5_AdverseEvent_resultingEffect
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AdverseEvent.resultingEffect for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.resultingEffect from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Effect on the subject due to this event
element.definition: Information about the condition that occurred as a result of the adverse event, such as hives due to the exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical) or a broken leg as a result of the fall.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.resultingEffect` maps to R4B `AdverseEvent.resultingCondition`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
